interface.name: xdg_wm_gestures_v1

description.summary: Generic framework to attach WM behavior

interface.description:
The xdg_wm_gestures_v1 interface is exposed as a global object, it allows clients to notify the compositor of gestures (or actions) happening on portions of the toplevel that would tie in to window management logic.
This WM gesture mechanism is kept open and high-level on purpose, so that compositors may apply global policies and behaviors (e.g. middle-click lowering windows) to get a common look and feel across clients.
Clients should avoid requesting multiple actions on the same input, either through this or other protocol (e.g. xdg_toplevel.show_window_menu).
Compositors are free to implement (or not) actions associated to these gestures.
Warning! The protocol described in this file is currently in the testing phase. Backward compatible changes may be added together with the corresponding interface version bump. Backward incompatible changes can only be done by creating a new major version of the extension.
